title: What Do I Wear?
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 39 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: In What Do I Wear?, a girl is getting dressed. She tells where pieces of clothing and other items are worn on the body. Patterned text, the high-frequency word a, and supportive pictures make this book perfect for emerging readers.
meta: chest, heart, smile, waist, wears, wrist
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Nouns : Identify nouns as naming words
High-Frequency Words : Identify and write the high-frequency word a

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
